title: How to Unblock & Recover a Wechat Account

steps.title: Go to https://support.wechat.com/cgi-bin/mmsupport-bin/readtemplate?t=weixin_unlock_self&step=0.
steps.content: Go to https://support.wechat.com/cgi-bin/mmsupport-bin/readtemplate?t=weixin_unlock_self&step=0 . This will take you to a WeChat support form where you can attempt to unblock your account. If your WeChat account was registered in Mainland China, click For mobile numbers in Mainland China, tap here to unblock .

steps.title: Select your ID type.
steps.content: Select your ID type. It's how you'll identify your WeChat account. If you don't know your WeChat ID, use your mobile number, email, or QQ ID.

steps.title: Enter your WeChat ID, mobile number, email, or QQ ID.
steps.content: Enter your WeChat ID, mobile number, email, or QQ ID. In the fields beneath "Banned WeChat Account," enter the appropriate information. [2] X Research source

steps.title: Select a country and enter your phone number next to "Send verification code to.
steps.content: Select a country and enter your phone number next to "Send verification code to. " Use the number associated with your WeChat account here.

steps.title: Enter the CAPTCHA characters.
steps.content: Enter the CAPTCHA characters. You'll see the code on the right. If you can't see it well, click Try a different one and you might get one that's easier to see.

steps.title: Click Send Verification Code.
steps.content: Click Send Verification Code . This will prompt the WeChat system to send a verification code to the phone number associated with your account. [3] X Research source

steps.title: Follow the instructions included with the code.
steps.content: Follow the instructions included with the code. The text message you get with the verification code should also link you to a place where you can enter the code. [4] X Research source
